hymn.title: Jesus, Redeemer and my one Inspirer

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, Re -- deem -- er and my one In -- spir -- er, Heat in my cold -- ness, set my life a -- glow. Break down my bar -- riers; draw, yea, draw me nigh -- er. Thee would I know, whom it is life to know.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus, Redeemer and my one Inspirer, Heat in my coldness, set my life aglow. Break down my barriers; draw, yea, draw me nigher. Thee would I know, whom it is life to know.
